availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ruthey R. Manion (Hart County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of George Jones and Ruthey Durbin Jones. Married to Matthew H. Manion. Mother of George T. Manion, Ruth J. Manion, Mary C. Manion, Ada M. Manion. Resident of Hart County in 1850. Resident of Hart County in 1860. Employed at State Military Hospital (U.S.A.) in Kentucky from December 1863 to January 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart, p. 206B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart, District 2, p. 881.
